title: HELP My friend got hacked 34 min from now
body:
amala1 EU Nordic & East -- IM helping him with the recovery of it and he is dead mind now .. one of his friends in facebook send him link with free skin bullshit .. and now Im trying find email and he dont remember with witch email make it .. I need help we play premades yesterday pls help
go see the matches.. to know .. system its so broken so one can change the email only he need to type new email and password not need old one
I dont know what to do ...

replies.body: Have your friend hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416), and our account team can help with recovery.  In the meantime, his other friend should be informed so he can secure his FB account.  Sorry that happened, but we can take care of him!
